projects.name: Pierre's Needs a new Cellar
projects.author: Pierre Gunderson
projects.description: Pierre's general store would like to expand their warehouse to include an assortment of root vegetables, beer, and wine to sell to customers.
projects.reward: One bottle of the first batch of cellar wine.

projects.name: Leah needs an art studio built
projects.author: Leah Churchwell
projects.description: Leah does so much art but she needs somewhere to display and sell it! Leah needs help to build a new studio on her property, as well as wood and tools.

projects.name: Elliot Needs a new Portrait
projects.author: Elliot Waddsworth
projects.description: Elliot needs a new portrait done. Come to his place at noon tomorrow with your best try and he will judge it accordingly.
projects.reward: Elliot will add the best portrait to his home collection.
